## Description
Implement comprehensive unit tests for all HTTP handlers to improve code coverage and reliability.

## Tasks
- [ ] Test authentication handlers (login, register, logout)
- [ ] Test admin handlers (manage subjects, user roles)
- [ ] Test teacher handlers (upload tests, dashboard)
- [ ] Test student handlers (take test, view results, dashboard)
- [ ] Add test fixtures and mocks for database operations
- [ ] Achieve >80% code coverage

## Priority
Medium

## Category
Testing

## Labels
